properties.areaDesc: Southern New London; Southeast Suffolk; Northeast Suffolk; Southern Middlesex
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 7 at 6:38PM EST until February 8 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Middlesex and Southern New
London Counties. In New York, Northeastern Suffolk and
Southeastern Suffolk Counties.

* WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
